title: Bug 114470[Smoke]Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
OB: When using new Date("3/2/2005") as a value in the table filter, an error message is thrown.
EB: The filter should work without any errors.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Set the filter value to new Date("3/2/2005").
2. Save and preview the table.
3. Check if the filter works without any errors.

Note: The error message displayed on the report page is: "There are error(s) in Table : table8
Error0 : data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s))
detail: An error happened in data type conversion. Can not convert it to Date. Can not convert it to Date."
